column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are made available on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. The customer is responsible for payment for the services used by himself or by other participants belonging to him. If the customer account is assigned to a higher-level account (consolidated account), the higher-level account can also be responsible for payment.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: COL_WAIVER_IND
column.comment:
Indicates whether an account should be waived from automatic collection treatment.  N - Automatic Collection Treatment can be performed.
 “Y” - The account is permanently waived from the Automatic Collection treatment"
 It can be changed to value 'Y' or reset back to 'Normal' manually through the Online maintenance.

column.name: COL_WAIVER_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date the collection waiver was set.

column.name: COL_WAIVER_UID
column.comment: Teradata user ID of the user

column.name: COL_CATEGORY_NO
column.comment: Contains the unique number of the collection category to which the BAN belongs. The definition of the collection category is an outcome of the BAN, BAN type and credit class. It is relevant only for a delinquent BAN. It is used during the BAN's Collection treatment to review treatment termination conditions.

column.name: COL_PATH_CODE
column.comment: The collection path code

column.name: COL_NEXT_STEP_NO
column.comment: Defines the sequence number of the next collection step in the relevant collection path (which should be activated on the account).

column.name: COL_NEXT_STEP_DATE
column.comment: Defines the date when the next collection step should be activated.

column.name: COL_NEXT_STP_APR_COD
column.comment: Indicates whether or not the next step requires a collector's approval.

column.name: COL_NEXT_STP_APR_COL
column.comment: Contains the ID of the collector, which approved the activity.

column.name: COL_ASSIGNED_COLL
column.comment: Contains the workposition of the collector assigned to the account at the time of the activity.

column.name: COL_COLCT_ASD_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date on which the BAN was assigned to the collection rep.

column.name: COL_AGNCY_CODE
column.comment: Contains the ID of the collection agency assigned to the account at the time of the activity.

column.name: COL_AGNCY_ASD_DATE
column.comment: Contains the assignment date of the collection agency.

column.name: EU_COL_AGN_ASD_AMT
column.comment: The balance of the account, in Euro, at the time the entry was created.

column.name: COL_FIXED_PATH
column.comment: Contains the path code that will be assigned to the BAN each time the BAN becomes delinquent.

column.name: INKASSO_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the account is handled by Inkasso (assignment to collection agency process).

column.name: COL_CA_STATUS
column.comment:
Indicates the status of the assignment to the collection agency process. 
I- In process
A- Assign to collection agency
C- closed

column.name: COL_AGNCY_MMBR_NO
column.comment: The collection agency membership number to which the account is assigned.

column.name: EU_VDF_PROFIT
column.comment: The account calculated VDF profit, in Euro.

column.name: COL_WAIVER_REASON
column.comment: Contains the reason the waiver was set.

column.name: PA_THRESHOLD
column.comment: The percentage of the payment arrangement from the customer’s total debt. If the paid amount percentage is less than this value, the debt is considered paid. This field contains a value, in case the threshold percentage differs from the default (from the Market Policy).

column.name: COL_CA_INTERNAL_NO
column.comment: The internal number of the account at the collection agency.

column.name: COL_CA_LAWYER_NO
column.comment: The internal number belonging to the collection agency lawyer that handled the account.

column.name: COL_CA_REF_NO
column.comment: The referral number of the Collection Agency Lawyer that handles the account.

column.name: PYM_ARR_CA_REQ_IND
column.comment: When an account is assigned to a collection agency, and this attribute is set to ‘requested’, the account will be assigned to a collection agency that handles payment arrangements.

column.name: COL_CUST_GRP_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the account entered collection treatment due to being in the same customer group with a delinquent account.

column.name: COL_CA_INTERNAL_STS
column.comment: The agency internal status of the account.

column.name: GROUP_ID
column.comment: Invoice item group ID

column.name: COL_STEP_NUM
column.comment: Contains the sequential number within the path of the collection step, which was performed on the account.

column.name: INKASSO_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date when the INKASSO-IND was set

column.name: STEP_NAME
column.comment: Contains the name of the collection step performed on the account.

column.name: ACTIVITY_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the activity is applied or reversed.

column.name: ACTIVITY_REASON
column.comment: The reason of the activity.

column.name: CONVERSION_NUM
column.comment: The number of the conversion running.

column.name: LIABLE_IND
column.comment:
Indicates whether the Collection letter is to be sent to the Billing address or to the Legal address. 
B - Billing
L – Legal

column.name: ARCOR_SUSP_DATE
column.comment: Date on which step activation should make suspension of the account’s hotline subscribers. Populated when special letter is sent, for example run_date + 10 business days ( table driven from Collection_Policy).

column.name: ARCOR_TRT_STS
column.comment:
Status of ARCOR relevant treatment.
Null, or ‘N’ – no treatment
L -  letter is sent
T – in range of special treatment .
S –Arcor suspened

column.name: ARCOR_TRT_STS_DATE
column.comment: The date when the ARCOR_TRT_STS was last updated.

column.name: ONE_DAY_FU_OPENED
column.comment:
Status of existence of follow-up, opened before collection was started for account with past due below predefined limit
Yes – when follow up is opened before starting collection, when past due is below predefined limit.
No or Null – when no  follow-up is opened before starting collection , when past due is below predefined limit.

column.name: NEXT_NEXT_STEP_DATE
column.comment: Defines the date when the next collection step should be activated.

column.name: INKASSO_STATUS
column.comment: Status of inkasso treatment of the account.

column.name: EU_REP_LAST_PASTDUE
column.comment: The unpaid balance, in Euro, from the previous bill whose due date has already passed, i. e. PAST_DUE_AMT = previous balance - payments - billed (immediate) adjustments + billed (immediate) charges.

column.name: LAST_BILL_WAIT_DATE
column.comment:
Keeps the last run date when col_next_step_date was set to BILL-CONF-WAIT-DATE.
It will be set by payment method switch or collection ongoing (these processes may set col_next_step_date to BILL-CONF-WAIT-DATE). It will be reset by step activation and collection termination.

column.name: PRE_ETF_CANCEL_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date when the EU_PRE_ETF_AMT was calculated

column.name: INK_FINISHED_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date when the INK_FINISHED_IND was set
